actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to expand State enforcement of railroad safety laws.
short_title: Federal Railroad Safety Act Amendments of 1979

summary.text: Federal Railroad Safety Act Amendments of 1979 - Amends the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to grant States concurrent authority together with the Secretary of Transportation to enforce the provisions of such Act or the Federal regulations promulgated pursuant to such Act.

titles.title: Federal Railroad Safety Act Amendments of 1979
A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to expand State enforcement of railroad safety laws.
